SEARCH
Package net

Class Server

java.lang.Object
net.Server
public class Server extends Object
Server contains the server-side code. It relies on ClientHandler to communicate with each Client.

  • Constructor Details

    • Server

      public Server(MultiplayerController game)
      Constructor for Server.
      Parameters:
      game - Controller for the game. Used to trigger some methods in MultiplayerController.

  • Method Details

    • startServer

      public void startServer(int numPlayers, List<Card> startingHand)
      Call this function to start the server and keep it running indefinitely.
      Parameters:
      numPlayers - Number of expected players.
      startingHand - Player's starting hand.

    • createClientPlayer

      public void createClientPlayer(String playerName)
      Creates a new Player by calling GameController.createPlayer(java.lang.String, java.util.List<app.board.Card>).
      Parameters:
      playerName - Unqiue username of the Player.

    • broadcastMessage

      public void broadcastMessage(String messageToSend)
      Sends a message to all Clients.
      Parameters:
      messageToSend - Message to send.

    • sendMessage

      public void sendMessage(String username, String messageToSend)
      Sends a message to a specific Client.
      Parameters:
      username - Unique username of the Client.
      messageToSend - Message to send to the target Client.

    • getAllUsernames

      public List<String> getAllUsernames()
      Returns the list of username of all Clients.
      Returns:
      List containing all usernames.

    • handleResponse

      public int handleResponse(String message)
      Returns the message from Client to be handled by GameController. The message expected is a Card index.
      Parameters:
      message - Message recieved from Client.
      Returns:
      Card index entered by Client. Returns -1 instead in the event of a disconnection message or an invalid input.

    • getClientMessage

      public int getClientMessage(String username)
      Returns the last message sent by a specific Client.
      Parameters:
      username - Unique username of the target Client.
      Returns:
      The last integer message by Client. -1 is returned instead in the event that username has no match.

    • listenFrom

      public int listenFrom(String username)
      Listens to a specific Client.
      Parameters:
      username - Unique username of the target Client.
      Returns:
      Index of the card chosen by the Client. Returns -1 instead if the Client's input is invalid.

    • clearAllClientsConsole

      public void clearAllClientsConsole()
      Sends a clear console command to all clients.

    • closeServerSocket

      public void closeServerSocket()
      Closes the server socket in case of an error
